definitions.text: a mercantile establishment for the retail sale of goods or services
examples: he bought it at a shop on Cape Cod

definitions.text: a supply of something available for future use
examples: he brought back a large store of Cuban cigars
a memory and the CPU form the central part of a computer to which peripherals are attached
storehouses were built close to the docks

definitions.text: keep or lay aside for future use
examples: The bear stores fat for the period of hibernation when he doesn't eat

definitions.text: find a place for and put away for storage
examples: where should we stow the vegetables?
I couldn't store all the books in the attic so I sold some
